Ralf Krakowski writes: 
> Thanks a lot for your response. 
> Any write up of such a paper would be great since I am new to both 
> JUnit and EJB. Could I help you in any way? 

You can poke me every so often so I don't procrastinate. :) Actually,
I've collected a lot of material in the last few weeks, and I just need
to polish it up a bit. I'm not aiming at formal publication or
anything... just an article on junit.org would be the limits of my
humble ambition.

Poke ! Poke! :-P
Thanks for your help!

Ralf
